1.content:
you and your family (mum, dad and your annoying older sister) were on a family holiday,the holiday was turning out to be a good one ,with sun shining every day and all your family getting along.
one day you went up the mountain for nice hike because you had heard that the view from the top was spectacular.
As you were climbing you could feel eyes on you as if they were studying you looking for something they thought you might have or whatever, you stop to look around and nothing, there was no evil maniac no good Samaritan trying to help you, you turn to get on with you hike when you hear a rustling noise that's when you notice a bush moving as if it is being disturbed by something. You take a step forward to see what was going on, you reach your hand out cautiously, the bush starts to move less and as your about to touch it.
"Marcus get up here" you hear your dad shout to you
you look back between your dad and the bush and decide it better not to anger your dad like that and run up to your family.

"hey dad are we there yet?"whined your older sister.
does it look like were there idiot you thought to yourself
"hehehe" you heard an almost non-human laugh for it was so deep it was barley audible. you spun around to see what was there, yet nothing appeared, now you are starting to wonder what the hell is going on.
"did you guys hear that?" you asked
"hear what, dear?" said your mum in her usual calm tone
"someone or something laughed" you replied you eyes still looking for any signs of movement
"son, there is nothing there" said your dad as he continued to march up the path
you look suspiciously in that direction one last time in the hope of seeing something but your hopes were dashed as you followed your dad up the mountain.

Throughout the entire journey could not focus on what you were doing as you kept getting the feeling that someone or something was watching you. Studying you.

When you had finally completed the mountain journey, you pumped your fist in victory and then looked out the people had not lied, though to say the view was amazing would be an understatement as the way the light bounced of the water almost creating a path that lead of the horizon the cool breeze comforting you under the unforgiving sun, gave you a feeling of complete comfort like a baby in its mothers care, momentarily forgetting that feeling of being studied. When you went back down the mountain you were 100% sure you were being watched and when you spun around you saw.....
1.title: day of truth

11.content:
you turn around and soon wish that you didn't as a beast of wolves with fur as black as night and eyes as evil and red as hell itself. the beast takes two steps forward and crouches. every bone in your body was telling you to get the fuck out of there, but your body was frozen as if being grip by a hand, like a murderer would around the neck of his next victim, the beast in front of you jumped, you closed you eyes fearing it was the end.

"AAAAAAAAHHHH" you heard someone scream. then it hit you it was going after you family. you opened you eyes to see your mother laying on the floor her body was limp and lifeless next to her you sister who was writhing about on the floor covered in a mixture of your mothers and her own blood then the creature stood over her glanced at you with a look that said i'm going to make you suffer
With that it opened its jaws a put them over your sisters head. you could still hear he muffled screams, its jaws clamped down and with one sharp movement it snapped her neck and threw her away like a rag doll, her screams still echoed in your ears. Then it turned his attention to your dad who had been knocked into the bushes in beasts first attack, getting up still dazed, he ran and the beast only laughed as he easily caught him placing his jaws on his left leg, and after a bit of tugging and screaming, ripped it off and swallowed it whole.your dad helpless as a baby without a carer tried to crawl towards you his arms and his body was shaking with agony and pain. He looks up at you as if apologising. only then did the monster put him out of his misery by putting his paw on his head pressed until his head collapsed under it like a grape.

The beast now having had it's fun looked at you and walked up. its eyes boring into you with venom. You break down and cry not sure if its that you watched you family die right in front of your eyes or that you were scared this was the end. Your crying and pleading that this all just a bad dream.

the black beast pounced at you claws bared and jaw open
11.title: with death comes new life

111.content:
You close your eyes waiting for death to come in the form of sharp claws that crippled your heart or the gruesome jaws of the thing that murdered your family. You wait for the end.
You always thought that the longest second of you life would be the second before you died, but you never felt any pain.
Have I died already you thought, though you never had the experience before, this was not what you expected for your demise.

"RUN" you hear, though not a voice you recognise it is oddly familiar.
You open your eyes. There are two giant beasts right in front of you. You recognise the black monster the brutally murdered your family. But there was a white beast, of similar shape and size, doing battle with it. They were locked in a vicious embrace of claws and teeth. Emitting from it were ungodly growls and barks that paralysed your muscles and struck fear into your heart. You see the black beats bite into the white monsters paw and blood leaks out, unsure weather it's your family's or from the monsters in front of you. A the same time the white monster gouges at the back of the black beast leaving clear claw marks but you see nothing spill from the deep wound. The monsters claw at throats. Bite at backs. Swipe for underbelly. Gnaw at limbs. Such a confusion of violent acts for a reason you did not yet know. Whilst this duel of two savages was happening You hear the voice again "RUN YOU FOOL"
You don't know what it is but you agree with the advice. You look where to go and are stuck with a dilemma.

You look up the hill where you came from, to that peaceful peak where you felt happiest and safe, but you knew it only lead to a dead end. And down, past the on going struggle of monsters, where you came up a had more places to run to but have no idea where to go once at the bottom!

You put your head down, turn and bolt......
111.title: Saved by a beast

112.content:
you close your eyes and wait for the end, waiting to feel the pain of the claws slash your chest or suffer the jaws around your throat, but you feel nothing but the same coo breeze you felt at the top of the mountain.
Is this what death feels likewas your first thought
"no, your alive" a voice said in a oddly relaxing tone
you open you eyes to find yourself in a plain white room with a chair and a table next to it, on the table is some chocolate, you eye it suspiciously.

then it hits you like a blow to the stomach you double over and your knees give way, tears come running down your face over the extremely recent death of family and one word repeats itself.
"why?"you say "why me? why now? why do this?"
"because your special, Marcus"
"WHO ARE YOU?" you scream with rage over the interruption of your morning
"i am a friend you need know no more" the same bodyless voice said in the same tone that was getting extremely annoying now
"SHOW YOURSELF!! WHAT DO YOU WANT WITH ME?" you scream
"i want to teach you, to help you"you heard as a _______ appeared.


fill the blank
112.title: new experiences

choices: 5 months later (classes are coming to a end)
1121.content:
A man dressed in robes of flowing green which sparkled with the essence of magic and knowledge, and with a friendly smile on his face and open arms he took a confident step forward. At this exact time you took a cautious step backwards, still in shock over the trauma you just experienced your placed in a unknown room in a unknown location and now this stranger who is not giving away anything. You find yourself with you back into a corner.
He noticed this universal sign of mistrust and stopped instantly, "Ah, forgive me I'm sure this is all very confusing for you" you just stared back, with a mixture of fear, venom & mistrust in your eyes.
"You need fear nothing from this place or the people inside, we are here for your safety and comfor..."
"WHAT!?" You shouted "My safety! What about my family? What about them,eh? Why couldn't you save them? Wh.."
"If you'll let me finish" he interrupted "you'll find out that we have been watching you for some time, waiting for the right time to revel ourselves. Unfortunately, unexpected events forced our hand to reveal ourselves earlier than expected". You remained silent.
"Now" he said, whilst turning on his heel and his long robes filing in behind him "if you'll kindly follow me i'll show you too your room and introduce you to your teachers"
"Teachers?" You managed to squeak out
"Yes teachers, they will teach you how to fight and how to survive" he said calmly as if these where Maths and English lessons you were taking.
1121.title: A suspicious friend

12.content:
A white wolf, that stands over 6 ft tall and holds it's head high and proud but with compassion it's fur white and smooth, you stood awe struck and a sense of safety embraced you for some unexplainable reason, but as you notice it's feet your heart sinks with fear as black claws as menacing as daggers are sticking out of it's paws and huge legs that looked powerful enough to send you flying. it's tail was furry and looked like it was combed every day, in fact this wolf looked like it had been pampered it's whole life with fur so perfect, frame and build top quality and claws sharper than a perfect blade, yet it looked like it had worked to get to this position and had to struggle to hold it, some spoke words in the way it stands sort of proud to be here, not proud how he got here.
There is more to this thing than meets the eyeyou thought to yourself
more than you will ever know Marcus you sense in your head
"Wait can you hear my thoughts?, and how do you know my name?" you say shocked and taking two steps back and the tripping over a branch landing on the hard ground not wanting to anger the wolf you stand quickly up and don't move
I have been watching you for a very long time you sense as the wolf nods it head
"have you been watching me?"
yesthe wolf replied
"what for, there is nothing special about me" you say with a confused tone
There is more to you than meets the eyeit said which made you wince in embarrassment, this made you realize that it hasn't moved it's head yet
"what are you looking for?" you say whilst turning around trying to see if there was anything worth noticing and made you realize that your family carried on walking and has left you.
I am looking for something it says
"what?"you ask
you ask a lot of questions
"I'm sorry meeting a giant wolf isn't a every day occurrence for me" you say a bit more aggressive than you wanted to
the wolf finally looking down at you showing it's big blue eyes that held pain from suffering and loss but it held a oddly calm expression on it's face
"now is not the time to answer all your questions" it says out loud in a equally calm tone to match it's face
"okay" you say confused and with a feeling that your gonna be spending a lot of time with this wolf, you stand there in awkward silence for a moment
"why are we...."
"that's your family time for you to go" it interrupts, but as you listen you hear nothing until
"marcus....marcus ....MARCUS!" you can hear your family calling your name how did he hear them
"yeah maybe" you say trying not to ask a question but then you realize your standing alone
"Marcus, there you are we thought you had gotten lost" your mum says giving you a hug
"you need to keep up" says you dad giving you a pat on the back.


Later in your room

as you lay in the bed of your room. you cant help but think about what the wolf said
i am looking for something and "now is not the time to answer all your questions"
what did he mean? I'm going to see him again, aren't I? hopefully hell be a bit more helpful i'm still full of questions

13.content:
Nothing, you were certain that something was spying on you, ythet you could not see anything except the the dusty trail with the untrimmed trees, scattered rocks and stones and the overgrown brush around it.
You were starting to think that the heat from the sun was getting to you and you needed to got back to your room and lay down for a while, you know get some R&R, the climb up the mountain had taken a lot out of you, so you turned around and caught up with your family once again.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ---

later that night

The hotel room which is very nice as hotel rooms on a budget go, only has two rooms bedroom and bathroom, though the bath is very small so you have to take showers else you won't fit, there is a toilet and all the essentials; towels, soap, shampoo and conditioner etc. the bedroom is a reasonable size with a bunk bed next to widow and with a sort of pathway that leads from the door to the window at its feet, next to it is a bed side table with a lamp on top for reading or whatever on the other side is the master bed with and brown blanket laying neatly on top of a white bed sheet the pillows were placed as if they had never been used before.

You open the door go to the closes bed, which is the master bed, and fall on top of it through sheer exhaustion, you are unable to move any part of you body as it aches everywhere, you hadn't realized that you'd have to walk all the way home after getting a taxi there. On the plus side you were now home and could get that R&R you wanted. you didn't notice but you fell asleep almost straight away as soon as you head hit the pillow.

"GET OUT NOW" is the first thing you hear as you wake up unexpectedly and like anytime your woken up by a loud noise the adrenaline is pumping straight away forcing you to be as awake and aware as if it were the middle of the day, you turn your head and see you dad fighting off something but its too dark to see what but from small glimpses you know its not human.
"Marcus" your dad calls at you "your mum and sister out of here"
still confused as to whats happening you realize the front door is blocked by the fighting so your only other option is to escape via the balcony quickly you jump up and get u mum and sister away form the the fighting then you rip open the door that leads to to the balcony and get you sister and mum out there first, you were only staying on the second floor so the drop isn't great once both your mum and sister are on the ground you look back and see your dad hit the wall and is knocked out.
13.title: Things do go Bump in the Night
